meanings.definition: In a manner that is written by hand
meanings.sent2: The letter was autographically penned by the author.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to autographically write its name with its paw.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was autographically expressed in every handwritten note.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scroll was autographically inscribed with mystical symbols.

meanings.definition: Relating to the process of writing by hand
meanings.sent1: The autographically written letter had a personal touch.
meanings.sent2: The autographically crafted invitation stood out among the printed ones.
meanings.sent3: The autographically decorated journal was a unique gift.
meanings.sent4: Her autographically designed cards were always cherished by friends.
meanings.sent5: The autographically inscribed ring held sentimental value for generations.
